dialogue.text: At the architect's funeral, I realize: we never needed to solve the question. We needed to become it.
You're one of the architect's successes. I can see it in how you hold uncertainty.
Their simple 'What if you ARE the question?' changed my entire academic career.

visual_elements.memorial_stone: Bearing only 'What am I?' no name

psychological_notes: The architect's death becomes teaching about impermanence and mystery. Their legacy lives through transformed individuals who now carry the question forward. Shows how one person's embodied uncertainty can catalyze cultural transformation. Maya represents new generation inheriting this wisdom naturally.
philosophical_underpinning: True teaching transcends the teacher through embodied transmission
therapeutic_direction: Death as continuation of mystery rather than ending
